segments.text: Do you eat a lot of fruit and vegetables in you country ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we do . The most popular vegetables are potatoes , carrots , peas , and cauliflower . The most popular fruit are apples , bananas , pears , peaches , grapes , and oranges . Do you like vegetables ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like them very much . We also eat a lot of vegetables in my country , buy we eat different kinds .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which kinds of vegetables do people in your country usually eat ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We eat a lot of sweet corn , broccoli and eggplant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love eggplant ! Unfortunately , it ’ s quite expensive in my country , so I don ’ t eat it often .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because we don ’ t grow it much in my country . We import a lot from other countries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . We grow a lot of fruit and vegetables in my country . We export a lot of melons , grapes , oranges and lemons . In your country , do you eat corn on the cob ? It's very popular in my country .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We eat it in my country too , but I wouldn't say it ’ s very popular . Most people buy frozen sweet corn from their local supermarket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do people usually buy frozen vegetables in your country , it ’ s very rare in mine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A lot of younger people like to buy large packets of mixed frozen vegetables . Peas and sweet corn have been sold frozen in my country for many years . I prefer to buy fresh vegetables .
segments.speaker: S2
